.. _`bcf2fastq`:

BCF2FASTQ
=========

Run demultiplexing of base call (BCL) files into Fastq files





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_bcfl2fastq:
        input:
            run_dir = directory()
        output:
            out_dir = directory()
            interop_dir = directory()
            stats_dir = directory()
            reports_dir = directory()
        threads: 3
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/bcl2fastq"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
